result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Leanna Rose Demars Huser

records.addlTxt: Status conference on November 28, 2022 at 10:00 am.

CASES: 22CF287 & 22CF288. 2:08 PM. Defendant Leanna Rose Demars Huser appeared by video, in custody (Bayfield).  Attorney Donna Burger in court for Leanna Rose Demars Huser.  Attorney Jeffrey Lawrence Kemp in court for State of Wisconsin. CW-clerk. 2:09 pm recess. 2:17 pm back on the record. Burger-requesting another status. Bonds cont. 2:20 pm adj.
Status conference scheduled for November 28, 2022 at 10:00 am.
Status conference on October 3, 2022 at 02:00 pm.

22CF288 and 22CF287:  2:07 PM Defendant Leanna Rose Demars Huser in court, in custody.  Plaintiff State of Wisconsin in court.  Attorney Donna Burger in court for Leanna Rose Demars Huser.  Attorney Holly Wood Webster in court for State of Wisconsin. JP-Clerk.  Atty Burger provided information from both files.  Waives formal reading.  DE enters NG pleas on all charges/both cases.  15 day prearraignment rights.  Ct accepts NG pleas.  Bond continues.  2:11 adj.
Status conference scheduled for October 3, 2022 at 02:00 pm.

BOND COVERS CASES 22CF287 & 22CF288. 
No controlled substances without a prescription and only in amount/frequency as prescribed. Not to possess or use drugs without a prescription or drug paraphernalia. Subject to testing to determine compliance upon reasonable suspicion.

CASES: 22CF287 & 22CF288. 11:34 AM Defendant Leanna Rose Demars Huser in court.  Attorney Donna Burger in court for Leanna Rose Demars Huser.   ADA David Stilin for the State of Wisconsin. AW-Clerk.  Atty Burger addresses the court.  Atty Burger  Waives in both cases.  KFV waiver of hearing.  CT-address DE.  CT-accepts waiver and finds PC and is bound over for trial.  Atty Stilin will refer DA Kemp to filing of info. Atty Burger filed Bond modification request. CT-addresses parties regarding probation hold.   CT- sets new bond for both cases.  11:47 am adj
Arraignment scheduled for July 29, 2022 at 02:00 pm.

BOND COVERS CASES 22CF287 & 22CF288
No controlled substances without a prescription and only in amount/frequency as prescribed. Not to possess or use drugs without a prescription or drug paraphernalia. Subject to testing to determine compliance upon reasonable suspicion.
